column4: Every time I install the current nVidia driver, and reboot, I can't click on anything. The menu and taskbar and all that loads
but I can't click on them.
I have to remove the driver :/
Could someone help me out with this?
Every time I attempt to install the latest nVidia driver and reboot, I cannot click on anything. I see my icons, the side panel, the taskbar and everything, but I can't click on anything. Help?
Every time I attempt to install the latest nVidia driver and reboot, I cannot click on anything. I see my icons, the side panel, the taskbar and everything, but I can't click on anything. Help?
what about starting in recovery mode
hold shift at boot get into recovery mode
did you mean safe mode, or recovery console?
